name: Secret Script - Learn a language in 30 minutes
name_original: Secret Script - Learn a language in 30 minutes
description:
Interested in Greek, or another a language with an unfamiliar alphabet? Secret Script will get you reading it in just 30 minutes*.

Just read the story on the page, and keep going as the letters slowly get replaced, until you'll find you're reading it in the Greek alphabet. Other approaches are far slower, often taking you weeks or months.

After as little as 30-60 minutes of painless reading, you'll be able to translate a sentence like: "ναρκισσιστικοί ελέφαντες στιγματίζουν γιγάντιους δεινόσαυρους" into English, even though none of the words in that sentence appear in the reading exercise.

Super Script is also able to create a new and unique writing system just for you, so that you can exchange secret messages with friends without needing to use any software.

*More specifically - able to read and understand the sounds of each word, and if those words sound like English ones, understand the words too. Doing so fluently, and coping with unfamiliar capital letters too may take a few hours. Having this core competence firmly under your belt will fast track your progress in learning the language itself. It is not a substitute for learning the language itself.
